Welcome to Bubble Translator!

Hereâ€™s how to get started:

1. Start the Service:
Open the app and tap the 'Start Bubble' button. Grant the necessary permissions for screen overlay and screen capture.

2. The Floating Bubble:
A floating bubble will appear on your screen. You can drag it to any position you like.

3. Start a Translation:
Tap the floating bubble once to begin a new translation. The bubble will disappear, and a blue crop tool will appear.

4. Select Text:
Drag the blue box to create a rectangle around the text you want to translate. You can adjust the box by dragging it again.

5. Wait for Capture:
Once you stop moving the blue box, the app will automatically capture the selected area after a few seconds. The blue box will disappear, and the floating bubble will reappear.

6. View the Translation:
You will see a small notification that says 'Translation ready'. Tap the floating bubble again to open a pop-up window displaying the full translation.

7. Closing the Pop-up:
Tap the back arrow in the pop-up window to close it and return to the floating bubble.

8. Settings:
In the translation pop-up, tap the three-dot menu icon and select 'Settings' to change the duration of the crop tool overlay.
